ul.li:
Hello, world! : Every possible ways to create a hello world GacUI project.
Cpp : Using C++ from stratch.
WorkflowScript : Using Workflow script from stratch.
CppXml : Using C++ and GacUI Xml Resource, with generated C++ code for loading UI from the precompiled binary GacUI Xml Resource.
Xml : Loading the precompiled binary GacUI Xml Resource dynamically at runtime.
MVVM : A MVVM pattern demo using Xml Resource.

Layout : Demonstrates all layout features.
Alignment : Simple layout.
Stack : Stack layout with configurable axis directions.
Flow : Flow layout with configurable axis directions.
Table : Table layout.
TableSplitter : Table layout with splitters, which can be dragged to change cell sizes.
RichTextEmbedding : Embed controls in a rich text document.
Responsive1 : Responsive layout by manually controlling, for understanding different types of responsive layout compositions.
Responsive2 : Responsive layout.
SharedSize : Synchronizing sizes across different compositions.

Controls : Demonstrates all controls and control templates. This demo is under development.
ContainersAndButtons : Using container controls and button controls.
TextEditor : Implementing a text editor that handle plain text and XML.
ColorPicker : Using ItemTemplate on ComboBox and BindableTextList to build a color picker.
AddressBook : Using tree view and list view control with data binding to build an address book editor.
ProgressAndAsync : Using $await to call a C++ provided async function in Xml Resource to implement async operation with proper UI interaction.
ListControls : Different list controls with bindable or unbindable data sources.
DataGrid : DataGrid with drop down filter, different embedded editor controls in cells, and sorting.
CalculatorAndStateMachine : Using Workflow Script's state machine syntax to create a calculator.
DocumentEditor : A rich text editor control.
DocumentEditorToolstrip : Import the resource and project from DocumentEditor and finish the editor with toolstrip controls.
DocumentEditorRibbon : Import the resource and project from DocumentEditor and finish the editor with ribbon controls.
Animation : Using XML and new Workflow coroutine operators to define different types of animations.
MenuVisibility : Control visibility of menu items.
Localization : Switching between languages and displaying localized text.
TriplePhaseImageButton : Create a triple phase image button using the Context property to connect control and control template.
QueryService : Child control queries services from ancestor controls.

ControlTemplate : Demonstrates all controls and control templates. This demo is under development.
BlackSkin : Create a set of control templates which look like Visual Studio's dark theme.

Xml : Demonstrates all features in the XML resource file. This demo is under development.
Instance_Window : Create a window.
Instance_MultipleWindows : Create multiple windows.
Instance_Control : Create a control.
Binding_Uri : Using -uri binding.
Binding_Eval : Using -eval binding.
Binding_Bind : Using -bind bindin.
Binding_Format : Using -format binding.
Binding_ViewModel : Binding to view model.
Event_Cpp : Handling event in C++.
Event_Script : Handling event in Workflow script.
Event_ViewModel : Handling event in view model.
Member_Parameter : Adding view model to window.
Member_Property : Adding property to window.
Member_State : Adding state to window.
Misc_ImportFolder : Using an image from a depended resource.

Windows : Demonstrates the native interaction between GacUI and Windows OS.
Direct2DClock : Using Direct2D to draw a moving clock.
WindowIcon : Control window and application's icons.

topic.title: Running a demo
topic.p: You will see a solution file by clicking the hyper link. Just open it using Visual Studio 2017 Community or higher version, right click a demo project and select "Set as Startup Project", and press F5.

topic.title: Modifying a demo
topic.p: After you modify any resource file, including XML or other resources like images, you need to run GacBuild.ps1 against GacUI.xml. And then compile the project again and press F5.
